title: Controversial startup's plan to 'sell sunlight' using giant mirrors in space would be 'catastrophic' and 'horrifying,' astronomers warn
summary: California-based startup Reflect Orbital aims to build a swarm of 4,000 giant mirrors in low Earth orbit to "sell sunlight" to customers at night. Experts warn that the mirrors could mess with telescopes, blind stargazers and impact the environment.

title: Astronomers discover surprisingly lopsided disk around a nearby star using groundbreaking telescope upgrade

title: 'Chemo brain' may stem from damage to the brain's drainage system

title: Gene on the X chromosome may help explain high multiple sclerosis rates in women

title: Humanoid robots could lift 4,000 times their own weight thanks to breakthrough 'artificial muscle'
